00071 /*
00072  * HOST --> DRONE Conversion macros
00073  */
00074 
00078 #define htods(v) (__typeof__ (v))_libsal_bswaps((uint16_t)v)
00079 
00082 #define htodl(v) (__typeof__ (v))_libsal_bswapl((uint32_t)v)
00083 
00086 #define htodll(v) (__typeof__ (v))_libsal_bswapll((uint64_t)v)

00091

00098  */

00103 #define dtohs(v) (__typeof__ (v))_libsal_bswaps((uint16_t)v)
00104 
00107 #define dtohl(v) (__typeof__ (v))_libsal_bswapl((uint32_t)v)
00108 
00111 #define dtohll(v) (__typeof__ (v))_libsal_bswapll((uint64_t)v)
00112

00120 
00121 /*
00122  * INTERNAL FUNCTIONS --- DO NOT USE THEM DIRECTLY
00123  */
00124 
00130 static inline uint16_t _libsal_bswaps (uint16_t orig)
00131 {
00132     return ((orig & 0xFF00) >> 8) | ((orig & 0x00FF) << 8);
00133 }
00134 
00140 static inline uint32_t _libsal_bswapl (uint32_t orig)
00141 {
00142     return ((orig & 0xFF000000) >> 24) | ((orig & 0x00FF0000) >> 8) | ((orig & 0x0000FF00) << 8) | ((orig & 0x000000FF) << 24);
00143 }
00144 
00150 static inline uint64_t _libsal_bswapll (uint64_t orig)
00151 {
00152     uint32_t _bswap_hi = _libsal_bswapl(orig >> 32);
00153     uint32_t _bswap_lo = _libsal_bswapl(orig & 0x0FFFFFFFFll);
00154     return ((uint64_t)_bswap_lo << 32) | (uint64_t)_bswap_hi;
00155 }
00156 
00162 static inline float _libsal_bswapf (float orig)
00163 {
00164     uint32_t res = _libsal_bswapl (*(uint32_t*)&orig);
00165     return *(float *)&res;
00166 }
00167 
00173 static inline double _libsal_bswapd (double orig)
00174 {
00175     uint64_t res = _libsal_bswapll (*(uint64_t*)&orig);
00176     return *(double *)&res;
00177 }
00178 
00179 #else // __BYTE_ORDER in neither LITTLE nor BIG endian
00180 #error PDP Byte endianness not supported
00181 #endif // __BYTE_ORDER
